mapper.insert: insert into review (review_no, product_no, member_id, reply, score, regdate, updatedate) values(rev_seq.nextval, #{product_no}, 'TEST', #{reply}, #{score}, sysdate, sysdate)
mapper.update: update review set reply = #{reply}, updatedate = sysdate where review_no = #{review_no}
mapper.delete: delete from review where review_no = #{review_no} and member_id='TEST'
mapper.select: select * from review where product_no = #{product_no} order by review_no asc
